Join the Peaky Blinders, Basil Fawlty and more for a merry Christmas at The Castle Hotel in Tamworth
Looking for Christmas party ideas? Live swing music, experiential comedy and dining fit for a king are among the treats at The Castle Hotel in Tamworth
06 Nov 2019, 08:59 by Josh Layton, https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/authors/josh-layton/
A night at the casino with the Peaky Blinders is among a cracking season of Christmas entertainment that comes with all the trimmings at The Castle Hotel in Tamworth.
The gangster-themed whirl is part of a fun and imaginative festive party programme that also includes Fawlty Towers comedy, cabaret and live swing music.
It’s not just The Shelby mob leading festivities, with musicians and actors bringing to life the likes of superstars including Basil Fawlty, Rod Stewart, Frank Sinatra and the Rat Pack


A Christmas casino night at The Castle Hotel will have a Peaky Blinders theme. (Image: BBC / Caryn Mandabach / Robert Viglasky)

Friends, families and works colleagues can dine in style with lavish festive lunches and dinners that are available throughout December, including Christmas Day, in an historic listed building that has been fully modernised with two unique banqueting suites.
The hotel has pulled out all the stops with a Christmas Day menu and is also laying on a festive Sunday carvery in the restaurant with a choice of starters, hand-carved meats with fresh veg and home-made desserts. Both are expected to be popular, so booking in advance is highly advised.
Children can also meet Santa at a special festive lunch days before Christmas, making The Castle Hotel a superb destination for all all ages.
Here’s the low-down on this year’s entertainment...
What’s on offer?

Themed entertainment nights



Guests at The Castle Hotel can sample the Fawlty Towers experience this Christmas.


Peaky Blinders casino night

By order of the Peaky Blinders, your presence is requested at a Christmas casino night. Be sure to dress for the occasion and try you luck on the tables. Friday, December 6. Arrive 7pm.

A night of cabaret - live music and comedy

Don your glad rags on for a night of comedy and live music on Friday, December 13. Arrive 7pm for 7.30pm show.

Basil’s Christmas Carol

Find yourself at Fawlty Towers for the evening, with Basil and the gang running dinner service - hilarity is sure to ensue...
Friday, December 20. Arrival 7pm for 7.30pm show.
A gala Christmas meal at all three events includes starters, mains, desserts, coffee and gingerbread, with a disco to follow until midnight.

New Year’s Eve 'Stars in Your Eyes' family party

Each table to nominate a performer for the competition. Includes a three-course meal, with alternative children’s menu. Sit-down 7.30pm prompt. DJ to bring in the new year until late.
The new year will also see a return of The Castle Hotel's murder mystery dinner.

For more information and to book click here

Santa’s Singing Sundays


Season's best: The music of Rod Stewart will be brought to life at The Castle Hotel. (Image: Newcastle Chronicle)


Rod Stewart live tribute

Featuring all the hits from an incredible career. Sunday, December 15. Arrive 6pm for sit-down 6.30pm dinner.

An evening of swing

With Sinatra, Bublé, Martin, Darin, & Cole. Arrive 6pm for sit-down 6.30pm dinner.
*A full Christmas roast dinner at all both events includes starters, mains, desserts, coffee and gingerbread, with entertainment until 11pm.
Children’s Christmas Lunch with Santa


Santa Claus is come to town...The big jolly man will entertain children at The Casle Hotel.

Bring the whole family and meet Santa days before Christmas.
The party Includes a children’s Christmas lunch, meet and greet with the big jolly man and a present for each child.
Food is served between midday and 2pm, with Santa visiting between midday and 3pm.
Bookings only. Sunday, December 22.

For more information and to book click here

The Christmas Day menu


The Castle Hotel has pulled out the stops for its Christmas Day menu. (Image: Stock image/Tamworth Herald)


Starters

Smoked salmon & king prawns with lemon dressing
Tomato & basil soup garnished with a fresh sprig of basil
Mango-ginger Wensleydale & bacon salad with crackers & balsamic vinaigrette
Grape & melon balls with orange segments & fresh mint

Mains

Traditional Christmas turkey with seasonal accompaniments
Beef chasseur served on a bed of creamy mash
Fillet of seabass with lemon butter
Emmental cheese & beetroot chutney soufflé (v)
*all served with roast & new potatoes, Brussel sprouts, & baton carrots

Desserts

Individual cheese platter stilton, brie, & mature cheddar & a selection of biscuits
Christmas pudding with brandy sauce
Deadly dark chocolate gateaux with Chantilly cream
Individual trifle torte with Fresh raspberries
Coffee & luxury mints
Includes crackers, hats, novelties, & a gift for each child
Disco to follow until midnight.

Cost

£52.50 for adults and £26.00 for under-12s

For more menu options and to book click here

Where is The Castle Hotel?


Fine venue: The Castle Hotel in Tamworth.

Lady Bank,
Tamworth,
B79 7NB
Email: hello@castlehoteltamworth.com
Telephone: +44 (0) 1827 317700

For more information and to book entertainment, food and drinks packages click here
